title: Texas Man
lyrics: I'm the only nigga doin' it, you other niggas ruined it
I'm too legit, go Hammer wit' the foolishness
My nana said my grammar can maneuver this industry
Until I'm stupid rich and now I'm stupid rich, ah
(Even if she go away, even if she go away) A-woo-woo!
Assumin' this is what they humor is
To Pimp a Butterfly my newest shit
In fact the rumor is the way I proven it
I’m a Texas Man (Texas Man)
I’m a pimp C and your boy bundy
I’m Texas Man (Texas Man, ayy gir, ayy girl)
Where they sip Conee and the purple codeine
I’m a Texas Man (Man, man)
Born and raised represent 'til the grave
I’m a Texas Man (Man), whoa baby, I’m a Texas Man (Man)
Everybody in the scene show me love (What’s up?)
From PA to H-Town got to know we blow it up
Got the whole damn city on my back (PA)
Tell 'em I’m gonna get the cash then bring you right back
I’ll be gone 'til November
Finna hop up on a plane gotta do a show in Spain
With some ladies and liquor (My nigga [?], bring the wine)
Know we about to have a good time, good time (Time)
And they don’t gotta have all that (Hell nah)
No way, don't have to have all that (Huh, no)
And they don't have to have all that
No, they don’t have to have all that (Let's get it)
I’m a Texas Man (Texas Man)
I’m a pimp C and your boy bundy
I’m Texas Man (You know we all good, baby)
Where they sip Conee and the purple codeine (Ooh!)
I’m a Texas Man (Man, man)
Born and raised represent 'til the grave
I’m a Texas Man (Man), whoa baby, I’m a Texas Man (Man)
Okay, I been that cold with her, baby
Fine is all I know, 50 carat
Watching all that for
Pay you know attention, what you doing all that for
Make your hoe a listen, I right a coalition
Pretty face, fat booty, cameltoe alition
When you were catching a buck
I was rhyming and busy
You went and got you a Chevy
Now me I bought me a Bentley
You finally found you applaud then I succeed on my pimpin
You been looking coat check to scope look like zero to pimp
I do this shit for the sport like it’s a hobby of sorts
I make that birdie spread eagle
And that’s your par for the course
And I’m a classic man made bask and dance
Soup black and tan with the racks in hand
So you got some bad bitch, where they at though
I’m stuck on hating and know what they doing that for
I’m a Texas Man (Texas Man)
I’m a pimp C and your boy bundy
I’m Texas Man (Texas Man)
Where they sip Conee and the purple codeine
I’m a Texas Man (Man, man)
Born and raised represent 'til the grave
I’m a Texas Man (Man), whoa baby, I’m a Texas Man (Man)
Yo you rocking with your boy Wash of course
Shout out to everybody in my city man
We on baby
Old Arthur what’s up
Let’s go
